betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Everyone keeps secrets, that's just part of being a person. Sometimes it is shame that drives us to hide things, but sometimes we just hide things for absolutely no reason.
And sometimes, we hide things from ourselves, afraid of what may happen.
This seems to be the main motivation behind the hidden Pharos powers of the bees of Ptah. 
Bees are nice and helpful, really nice and helpful, so it is easy to take them as just that, but it is clear now that even they have their own politics, and most importantly, a bigger overarching goal, that goes beyond just helping everyone around them.
I'm not really sure how, but I seem to have passed some sort of test, and the bees now trust me. Something big is in the works.
